设置不同屏幕宽度断点下的列宽分配值。.en-us: Set the column width distribution value for different screen width breakpoints.

控制子元素宽度溢出时自动换行。.en-us: Whether to automatically wrap when the child element is too wide.

通过参数`justify`与`align`控制不同方向上的对齐方式。.en-us: By setting the parameter `justify` and `align` control the alignment in different directions.

基于flex灵活控制列宽.en-us: Flex-based flexible control of column width

基于参数`flex`实现更灵活的列宽分配。.en-us: By setting the parameter `flex` implement more flexible column width distribution.

设置不同屏幕宽度断点下的`gutter`值。.en-us: Set the `gutter` value for different screen width breakpoints.

配合[fuc.FefferyResizable](https://fuc.fef.en-us: With [fuc.FefferyResizable](https://fuc.feffery.tech/FefferyResizable) to implement two sides width adjustable.
